channel.title: How do i edit my hamachi server?
channel.description:
hello :confused: :confused: :confused: :| how do i edit my moparscape server i dont have a clue :confused: ive tryed everything i know how the hell do i edit my server(i.e. make the hole server wildernes, change the log out button, change where u apear when u first log in to that server, change the resporn place, etc...)
[center]can some one please help me!!!! :( plz plz plz!!!!!!!! help me!!!!! :([/center]

item.title: How do i edit my hamachi server?
item.dc:creator: @rick_ro rick ro$$
item.description:
@rick_ro wrote:

ok first of all what source are you using and most changes are made in client.java in your server folder

for logout go in client.java and press ctrl+F and type what the logout button currently says.
you’ll know when you find it then change it to what you want it to say[br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2007, 10:09:28 AM[/size][hr]i cant help you with making all wilderness but i might be able to help spawn point

ok if i remember correctly it would be in in playerhandler.java
and you need to know the coords you start at and the ones you want to start at
then change the coords after you find them
but, im not sure which file its in

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit my hamachi server?
